fedilookup.invalid_address_format: Invalid address! Please use the form @user@domain.
fedilookup.no_address_set: You don't have a fedi address set.
fedilookup.generic_failure: Something went wrong! Talk to your admin for help.
fedilookup.set_address: Set the fedi address of %s to %s.
fedilookup.player_has_no_address: That player does not have a fedi address set.
fedilookup.unknown_address: That address is not associated with any player.
fedilookup.user_cache_miss: Failed to find the player associated with that address, who has UUID %s.
